item.title: Men and Women Cricketers of India to Get the Same Match Fees

item.title: Indian Cricketers Skip Meal with Complaints of 'Cold Food'
item.description: Indian Cricketers Skip Meal with Complaints of ‘Cold Food’ The Indian Cricket Team in the ongoing T20 Cricket World Cup has raised questions about the quality of food provided to them.
